sentences.english: This is the web blog in memory of Ms.
sentences.chinese: 这个网志是用来纪念何连郁文老太太。

sentences.english: Please indicate the source when you quote from my LIVE space. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 引用本网志内容时请您注明出处，谢谢合作。

sentences.english: Then, you can subscribe directly to the individual feeds you enjoy most.
sentences.chinese: 这样，你便可以直接预定你最喜欢的个人网志摘要。

sentences.english: The Big Green Chair: This blogger is the president of CFNI, the bible school which I attend.
sentences.chinese: 玆网志是由我就读的万国归主圣经学院院长所设计。

sentences.english: The blogs are a cross-section of Iranian society.
sentences.chinese: 这些网志的内容禳括伊朗社会的方方面面。

sentences.english: Fellow gentlemen woman, welcome this net will.
sentences.chinese: 各位先生女士，欢迎黎本网志。

sentences.english: Register a domain name with your name and redirect to your blog.
sentences.chinese: 注册一个国际域名并且指向你的网志。

sentences.english: Part Four: The thinking of affordance-effectiveness between weblog and education students' professional development.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，网志与师范生专业成长的给养效能思考。
